TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
Lord Greythane
You! How dare you insult me by coming here!
You! How dare you insult me by coming here!
You! How dare you insult me by coming here!
You! How dare you insult me by coming here!
Please, Lord Greythane. I have heard rumors...
Please, Lord Greythane. I have heard rumors...
Please, Lord Greythane. I have heard rumors...
Please, Lord Greythane. I have heard rumors...
You will leave this place at once! Neither you nor your rumors are welcome in Maethelburg.
You will leave this place at once! Neither you nor your rumors are welcome in Maethelburg.
You will leave this place at once! Neither you nor your rumors are welcome in Maethelburg.
You will leave this place at once! Neither you nor your rumors are welcome in Maethelburg.
But, Lord, It may not be as we thought. Liandra may not be...
But, Lord, It may not be as we thought. Liandra may not be...
But, Lord, It may not be as we thought. Liandra may not be...
But, Lord, It may not be as we thought. Liandra may not be...
My Knights will show you out. Do not speak her name in my presence ever again. In fact, do not return EVER again unless she is with you.
My Knights will show you out. Do not speak her name in my presence ever again. In fact, do not return EVER again unless she is with you.
My Knights will show you out. Do not speak her name in my presence ever again. In fact, do not return EVER again unless she is with you.
My Knights will show you out. Do not speak her name in my presence ever again. In fact, do not return EVER again unless she is with you.
Please! No, wait...
Please! No, wait...

Please! No, wait...
